transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi sir good morning Prashant bol raha hun sir India Mart se.
Customer: Ji Prashant ji good morning.
Executive: Ji sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Thik hai badhiya.
Executive: Thik hai kya hua lead vagaira to dekh raha hun main aa rahi hai but aapki taraf se connection nahi hai.
Customer: Usko thoda sa process mujhko thoda samjha dijiye na sir wo main abhi karu kya aap se?
Executive: Abhi free hai?
Customer: Ji ha free hai.
Executive: Ek minute ruko to main aapko bhej raha hun link.
Customer: Ek minute mujhko se minute ka time dijiye na main turant call back aapko kar raha hun.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai okay okay main thoda sa breakfast kar raha hun turant free hota hun main turant aapko call karta hun. Hanji hanji bilkul okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to understand the process.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to send a link.
- Customer asked for 5-10 minutes to call back.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 5-10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, process, callback
